document.full_text: jason bay homered and drove in three runs, ike davis went deep for the third straight game and the mets held off the arizona diamondbacks for their third straight win.
document.title: mets 6, diamondbacks 4: mets beat diamondbacks for third straight win
lines_and_colors: jason bay homered and drove in three runs, ike davis went deep for the third straight game and the mets held off the arizona diamondbacks for their third straight win.
